import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import img1 from '../images/planes.jpg' import img2 from '../images/blue_fit.jpg' import img3 from '../images/podium.jpeg' import { GlobalContext } from '../context/GlobalState'; function NewsCarousel() { const {news} = useContext(GlobalContext); return (

{news[0].title}

{news[0].caption}

{news[1].title}

{news[1].caption}

{news[2].title}

{news[2].caption}
) } export default NewsCarousel
